entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3Â°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
